attributes.additional_details: It’s happening everywhere . Dogs being restricted to on lead won’t work , it’s the people that own them and back hand breeders that need to be banned or have stricter ownership licensing in place.
attributes.background:
BRING BACK THE DOG LICENCE
Please see my link I created explaining why in more detail (copy and paste) 

https://chng.it/kmYsdjDqP5

This explains it thoroughly as not a lot of space in this box !

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624520

We can't accept petitions that link to other online petitions.
